title: 500,000 Subscriber Livestream! Half a Million Nerds and Counting!
description:
We're celebrating passing the 500k subscriber milestone with a special livestream!  Join us for some channel updates, a preview of things to come, and whatever YOU would like to talk about!  See you in the chat!

Next week's chat with WETA's Daniel Falconer: https://youtu.be/2IyrIuuiW10

Petition for the Mithril Edition of LOTR: https://www.change.org/p/warner-brothers-release-the-mithril-edition-of-the-lord-of-the-rings
